title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When attempting to use the 'copy package' feature in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui, I encountered some unexpected behavior. After selecting a package and choosing copy from the context menu, the following steps were performed: Create a new project xxx, then open the Package viewer and select a package in project A. Finally, from the context menu, choose 'copy'. However, the expected behavior did not occur.
OB: The 'copy package' feature did not function as expected.
EB: The package should have been successfully copied to the specified destination.
SR: To reproduce this issue, please follow these steps: 1. Create a new project 'xxx'. 2. Open the Package viewer and select a package in project A. 3. From the context menu, choose 'copy'.
